getTemplateNameTranslator

public TemplateNameTranslator getTemplateNameTranslator()
Returns the template name translator. The default template name translator

Returns:
the template name translator used

setTemplateNameTranslator

public void setTemplateNameTranslator(TemplateNameTranslator templateNameTranslator)
Overrides the default template name translator setting.

Parameters:
templateNameTranslator - the template name translator that should be used

isAutomaticNewlines

public boolean isAutomaticNewlines()
Determines whether newlines are added automatically (true by default) after text lines.

Returns:
true if newlines should be added by the parser, false if they have to be inserted by the template author
See Also:
NewlineInstruction

setAutomaticNewlines

public void setAutomaticNewlines(boolean automaticNewlines)
Overrides the default automatic newlines setting.

Parameters:
automaticNewlines - whether the parser (true, the default) or template authors (false) have to insert newlines
